section: 4.3.2: Applying the product rule: Counting burrito selections.
instructions:
A burrito stand sells burritos with different choices of stuffing. The set of choices for each category are:

  • Meats choices = {chicken, beef, pork}
  • Bean choices = {black, pinto}
  • Salsa choices = {mild, medium, hot}
question: Now suppose that the burrito stand introduces a choice between plain flour or whole wheat tortillas? The option to substitute veggies instead of a meat is still available as well. Now how many selections are there?
